summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code; amending Section 11.18.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Section 2 of Ordinance 108200), classifying Alaskan Way East Roadway, between South Royal Brougham Way and Alaskan Way South, as an arterial; amending Section 11.62.060 of the Seattle Municipal Code, changing the name "truck route" to "Major Truck Street"; deleting the verbal description of truck routes; and indicating Major Truck Streets on a map.
